name: Rubiks Solving AI
description:
Exam project at school.

It includes:

Simulation Mode - A 3D cube that you can play around with however you want.

Solver AI - An automated mode for solving the cube if you get stuck or need to reset.

Scramble Generator - Automatically scrambles the digital rubiks cube for you.

Speed Solve Gamemode - A timer to test your solving speed, as well as a scramble generator.

Patterns - A mode where you are given a few cool patterns and instructions on how to get to that state.

Scramble Copier - This is what the main use of the program is, you feed in your scramble from real life, then the AI solves it for you, and then it gives you the solution. What this means is that if you have a rubiks cube that you can't solve, this is your solution (without dissassembling the cube).
